commit_list.message: added controller spec for middleware autoloading
preload method override unless opted out by the user
clean out all the middleware handling code from context
moved middleware logic in to the controller
example middleware was moved to spec helper, use that instead of defining ite in every spec case
renamed class_inheriting to subclass because, well, it just sounds better :)
removed environment method since its no longer supported
added example app that uses middlewares
made it possible to use globally
added global config and set methods
added some more documentation to example
removed environment knowledge from config, KISS ftw
removed environment specific specs and added proper indentation
some more work on options helper, but we really should try to find a cleaner way to go about it
added options to context instances, there must be a better way to do this though
